page.title: 10HOUSING SURVEY _ MILDENHALL
page.content: The questionnaire was made to obtain as much information as possible from a small number of questions about homes and families. The questionnaires were delivered throughout{Mildenhall}and Ogbourne. When they had been completed they were returned to school, left at the village post office or collected by pupils when in the village on Wednesday 26th June. We worked in pairs and used Data Sheets to record the responses by use of tally marks. After we had collected the data we presented it in graphical form by use of pie charts, bar charts and graphs.We did some of this in each village and some with the two villages to compare them.It was interesting and we think it will be useful as we hope that people in the future will be able to find out about our way of life in these villages in 1985.
